item.name: MySQL Created tmp disk tables rate
MySQL Innodb buffer pool hit rate
MySQL Innodb buffer pool use rate
MySQL Table open cache used rate

trigger.name: Mysql created tmp disk talbes rate > 10% on {HOST.NAME}
Mysql innodb buffer pool hit rate < 90% on {HOST.NAME}
Mysql innodb buffer pool use rate < 90% on {HOST.NAME}
Mysql max connections used rate < 10% on {HOST.NAME}
Mysql table open cache used rate > 30% on {HOST.NAME}
Mysql threads cache hit rate < 90% on {HOST.NAME}
